Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurs in variants that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Ratio of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER executed by SYSTEM versus STAFF MEMBER (if applicable based on resource data)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in domestic declaration cases (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps or based on context in description)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that directly lead to Request Payment without intermediate rejections or resubmissions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Ratio of successful paths starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and proceeding through Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER versus those that loop due to rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that complete within the typical reimbursement window (e.g., within two months of submission, inferred from timestamps if available or via variant length as proxy)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of approval activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER, and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that do not contain any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that occur in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are part of the shortest successful variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that involve only one approver role (i.e., no ADMINISTRATION or BUDGET OWNER involvement)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any rejection activity later in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in variants with performance (total amount) below the median performance of all variants
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER per month to detect seasonal patterns
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that appear in variants with exactly two approval steps (PRE_APPROVER and SUPERVISOR only)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases
